systems.description: A comprehensive suite for managing core business processes.
Customer Relationship Management system for managing interactions with current and potential clients.
Human Resource Management system for managing employee information and processes.
Supply Chain Management system for optimizing the flow of goods and services.
Business Intelligence system for analyzing and presenting complex data.
Content Management System for creating and managing digital content.
Enterprise Asset Management system for managing maintenance and use of physical assets.
Document Management System for storing, managing, and tracking electronic documents and images.
Product Lifecycle Management system for managing the entire lifecycle of a product from conception through service and disposal.
E-Business suite for managing online business transactions and interactions with customers, suppliers, and partners.
